description: This file sets up an investment analyst application using various imported modules, configuring an agent with tools for stock analysis, and creating a web app interface.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with a language model and tools for specific tasks.

classes.name: AGUIApp
classes.description: Represents the web application interface for the agent.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: A model class for interacting with OpenAI's chat models.

classes.name: YFinanceTools
classes.description: Tools for retrieving stock data and analysis from Yahoo Finance.

methods.name: agui_app.get_app
methods.description: Returns the FastAPI or web application instance.

methods.name: agui_app.serve
methods.description: Runs the web server to serve the application.
